They'll follow you to the ends of the world!|Taion}} '''Taion''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|タイオン}}, ''Taion'') is a playable character in {{XC3}}. == Overview == Taion is an [[Agnus|Agnian]] soldier along with [[Mio]] and [[Sena]]. He is an Agnian human with [[Blade Eater]] traits. == Story == Taion was taken under [[Isurd]]'s wing and was trained up as a tactician in [[Colony Lambda]], a company unit of the army of Agnus. He was transferred to [[Colony Gamma]]'s special forces unit after Lambda suffered a crushing defeat at the hands of [[Colony 13]]. After awakening as an [[Ouroboros]] following a top secret mission, Isurd and the nation of Agnus now greet their former ally as an enemy.[https://twitter.com/NintendoEurope/status/1526502817804042241] He is a [[Tactician]] who can analyze the terrain using the communication function projected in his eyes, granting a great help in finding the way to the "land where the great sword stands", [[Swordmarch]].https://twitter.com/XenobladeJP/status/1536611094323933184 == Personality == Taion is a tactician of surpassing skill who supports his allies. Taion works alongside Mio and Sena, who trust his high level of insight and tactical judgment. On one hand, he has a cheeky personality, but on the other, he is sometimes too cautious, getting easily annoyed and impatient when he does not understand something.https://twitter.com/XenobladeJP/status/1493845499946086400 Though quick to point out his strategic acumen, it is one of the few things about himself that he has any confidence in. When his mentor [[Nimue]] died protecting him in a failed attack on Keves forces, he blamed his recklessness for her death and developed a preference for more careful and cautious plans in the hope that he would not allow any of his companions to die again. However, this has also occasionally led him to be indecisive and excessively timid when a more daring strategy would be more effective. Despite his aloof demeanor, he has been noted by others to be surprisingly kind and sensitive if somewhat prone to melancholy. == Gameplay == His initial [[Class (XC3)|Class]] is [[Tactician]], a [[Healer]] class. Taion specializes in supporting his allies by reducing damage with moves that make evasion for his companions easier while debuffing enemies. He also masters tricks to lure [[Enemy (XC3)|enemies]] like putting them to sleep.https://twitter.com/XenobladeJP/status/1536610246697033728 He uses a mysterious paper-like [[Blade (XC3)|Blade]] known as "Katashiro", to which he has taken a liking, and calls them "Mondo". In a [[Chain Attack (XC3)|Chain Attack]], Taion starts with 35 TP by default. His Chain Art is [[Art of Subjugation]], which reduces the enemy's physical defense by 30-50 percentage points (depending on his level) upon completing his order. Taion starts at Rank 8 in his initial Tactician class, and has a common [[Circlet of Intellect]] equipped when in the player's party for the first time. === Base Stats === These are Taion's raw stats prior to modifications by class.
